--- create_index_storing.sql
create index foo_bar on foo (
  bar asc
) storing (foo, baz)

--- AST
&ast.CreateIndex{
  Create:       0,
  Rparen:       40,
  Unique:       false,
  NullFiltered: false,
  Name:         &ast.Ident{
    NamePos: 13,
    NameEnd: 20,
    Name:    "foo_bar",
  },
  TableName: &ast.Ident{
    NamePos: 24,
    NameEnd: 27,
    Name:    "foo",
  },
  Keys: []*ast.IndexKey{
    &ast.IndexKey{
      DirPos: 36,
      Name:   &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 32,
        NameEnd: 35,
        Name:    "bar",
      },
      Dir: "ASC",
    },
  },
  Storing: &ast.Storing{
    Storing: 42,
    Rparen:  59,
    Columns: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 51,
        NameEnd: 54,
        Name:    "foo",
      },
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 56,
        NameEnd: 59,
        Name:    "baz",
      },
    },
  },
  InterleaveIn: (*ast.InterleaveIn)(nil),
}

--- SQL
CREATE INDEX foo_bar ON foo (bar ASC) STORING (foo, baz)
